EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-06-Field-East-ESB-DC.ES-2018-02-20 Exec 2.EM-2018-02-20 ESB-Ben Nye
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Washington DC Executive Networking Reception and Wizards Game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
I hope this email finds you well. Data center and cloud advancements are happening at an unprecedented rate. That means more decisions will have to be made, requiring a broader set of skills to keep your workloads healthy. While you can't automate people, you can automate workloads, and accelerate business growth.
I'm looking forward to hosting an event in your region on Tuesday, March 6th 2018, the Washington DC Executive Networking Series: Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-district/]]>, to discuss these advancements with CIO's, Executives, and leaders from organizations like yours. Together we will learn about the adoption of workload automation at the scale of hybrid cloud.
Following our cocktail hour and presentation, we'll take our seats in the Turbonomic Suite for the evening to watch All-Star Bradley Beal and the Washington Wizards take on Dwayne Wade and the Miami Heat.
Will I see you there? As seats are filling up fast, I do ask that you please register here <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-district/]]> as soon as possible.
Yours sincerely, Ben
<[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-phoenix]]>
Ben Nye Chief Executive Officer Turbonomic, Inc.
